verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's a blessed, blessed time coming soon,
It could be evening, morning or at noon
The wedding of the bride, united with the groom,
We shall see the King, when He comes,
Oh we shall see the King, when He comes.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We shall see the King, we shall see the King
When He comes.
He's coming with power,
We'll hail that blessed hour,
For we shall see the King when He comes.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh my brother are you ready for the call?
The kingdoms of this world
Shall soon before Him fall
For we shall see the King when He comes.
